table_caption: Correlation statistics for the relationship between Ins/Cr log-ratios and other MRI parameters, including white matter fractional anisotropy (FA) and mean diffusivity (MD), along with functional connectivity to the primary motor cortex (Fconn), averaging over significant brain regions as reported in Table 4, Table 5, Table 6. Values include Spearman correlations (corr) and partial correlations (pcorr) after adjusting for history of concussion (HOC), along with the change in absolute correlation strength |pcorr|-|corr|. Statistics include bootstrapped 95% confidence intervals (95%CIs) and empirical p-values on the change values.
